content:
Identity

Identity

  • Identity is the property of an object which distinguishes it from all other objects
  • Many objects have unique attribute values such as names or id’s
    • A U.S. citizen has a social security number and/or driver’s license
    • An employee is distinguished by an employee id
    • An automobile is distinguished by a license plate number
  • The identity of an object is preserved even when its state changes
  • Two objects can be identical in all properties, but still have different unique identifiers
